title: Ep 41: Connecting Black
itunes:title: Connecting Black
itunes:subtitle: African responses to the Black Lives Matter protests have been complicated and varied- some marched, others didn't. We explore some different African points of view. Let's Stoop this out.
author: hangout@thestoop.org (Hana Baba and Leila Day)
itunes:author: Hana Baba and Leila Day
